mapper.sql: t.uid uid, t.uname uname, t.phone phone, t.pwd pwd, t.salt salt, t.paypwd paypwd, t.paysalt paysalt, t.nickname nickname, t.nickicon nickicon, t.lid lid, t.lastIP lastip, t.nowIP nowip, t.lasttime lasttime, t.nowtime nowtime, t.regIP regip, t.regtime regtime, t.cid cid, t.score score, t.iscompany iscompany, t.sex sex, t.birsday birsday, t.provinceid provinceid, t.cityid cityid, t.countyid countyid, t.address address, t.baseinformation baseinformation, t.realnameauth realnameauth, t.identitycard identitycard, t.countNum countnum, t.userStatus userstatus, t.typeicon typeicon
mapper.update: update f_user set pwd = #{pwd} where phone = #{phone}
